casebody.data:
PITTSBORO MATTERS, INC., George A. Robertson, J. Turner Whitted, Christopher M. Watkins, Ducka Kelly and Greg Ogle, Plaintiff-Appellees,
v.
TOWN OF PITTSBORO, Defendant,
v.
Chatham Park Investors, LLC, Intervenor-Appellant. No. COA16-28. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. July 19, 2016.

Case Reported Without Published Opinion

Affirmed.
